span.span: When applied to a method, specifies that the method is called after serialization of an object in an object graph.

summary.span: 그래프의 다른 개체에 관한 serialization 순서는 결정적이지 않습니다.

span.span: The order of serialization relative to other objects in the graph is non-deterministic.
